mapper.select: select id as goodsId, goods_name as goodsName, book_number as isbn, goods_introduction as goodsDescribe, selling_price as goodsPrice, goods_image as goodsImagePath, star_level as goodsEvaluateScore, author as goodsAuthor, publisher as goodsPress, version as version from t_goods_info where is_delete = 0 and id = #{goodsId}

select distinct t2.user_acct as userAcct, t1.appraise_info as evaluateContent, t1.star_level as evaluateScore, t1.create_time as createTime, t1.user_id as userId from t_goods_appraise t1, t_sys_user t2, t_goods_appraise_images t3 where t1.user_id = t2.user_id and t1.goods_id = #{goodsId} and t1.is_delete = 0 and t3.is_delete = 0 and t1.id = t3.appraise_id
and t1.star_level in(0,1)
and t1.star_level in(2,3)
and t1.star_level in(4,5)
order by t1.create_time desc

select t2.user_id as userId, t3.appraise_image as imagePath from t_goods_appraise t1, t_sys_user t2, t_goods_appraise_images t3 where t1.user_id = t2.user_id and t1.id = t3.appraise_id and t1.goods_id = #{goodsId} and t1.is_delete = 0 and t3.is_delete = 0 order by t3.sort asc
select id as classifyId, category_name as classifyName from t_goods_category where is_delete = 0 and parent_id = 0 order by create_time desc

select t1.id as classifyId, t1.category_name as classifyName, t2.id as goodsId, t2.goods_name as goodsName, t2.goods_image as goodsImagePath, t2.selling_price as goodsPrice from t_goods_category t1 left join t_goods_info t2 on t2.category_second = t1.id where t1.parent_id = #{classifyId} and t1.is_delete = 0 and t2.is_delete = 0 order by t1.create_time desc
